Package com.company.Annotation_2

Class CallMethod

java.lang.Object
com.company.Annotation_2.CallMethod
@Preamble(date="16/10/2024", author="Goku", currentRevision=1, lastModified="N\\A", reviewers="Vegeta") public class CallMethod extends Object
The CallMethod class provides functionality to invoke methods of AnimeCharacter objects using reflection. It also includes the ability to handle custom annotations like RunImmediately to run methods multiple times based on annotation values.

Key Functionalities:

  • callAllMethods(): Invokes all methods of the passed AnimeCharacter instance.
  • RunImmediately(): Executes a method multiple times if the RunImmediately annotation is present.

Imported Classes Explanation:

  • java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException: Handles exceptions thrown by invoked methods via reflection.
  • java.lang.reflect.Method: Represents a method that can be invoked on an object at runtime using reflection.

  • Method Details

    • callAllMethods

      public static void callAllMethods(AnimeCharacter animeCharacter)
      This method retrieves and calls all declared methods of the AnimeCharacter class using reflection.
      Parameters:
      animeCharacter - the AnimeCharacter instance whose methods are invoked.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the invoked methods throw exceptions.

    • RunImmediately

      public static void RunImmediately(AnimeCharacter animeCharacter, Method method) throws InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException
      This method checks if a method is annotated with RunImmediately. If so, it invokes the method the number of times specified by the annotation's times value.
      Parameters:
      animeCharacter - the AnimeCharacter instance whose annotated method is invoked.
      method - the method to be invoked if annotated with RunImmediately.
      Throws:
      InvocationTargetException - if the invoked method throws an exception.
      IllegalAccessException - if the method cannot be accessed.
